biotools.summary:
Predicting MHC-peptide bindings for MHC alleles classes I and II using an attention-based deep neural model.

MHCAttnNet uses a Bi-directional Long Short Term Memory (Bi-LSTM) styled encoder to deal with variable-length peptide sequences. This permits the model to handle a large variety of peptides, and hence makes it more general.

bioschemas.name: MHCAttnNet
